description:
The Course - Overcome Shyness Now Using NLP Techniques teaches you , how to remove your shyness in important situations for professional and personal growth , We are very confident in many situations and shy in other situations , hence by using the techniques taught in this course by Pradeep Aggarwal you will overcome your shyness and become more confident in your life.

The techniques taught are-

  • Introduction to the course
  • True meaning of shyness
  • The relation between shyness and internal dialogue
  • Affirmations and auto suggestions
  • Anchoring technique to remove shyness
  • Exercise to overcome shyness
  • Modelling technique to generate a new behavior
  • Summary of the course
title: Overcome Shyness Now Using NLP Techniques
